content.rendered:
Immaculate 5-bedroom beachfront estate of first-class luxury

CURRENTLY AVAILABLE

$Price On Application

register interest

Property Information

There’s nothing more special than owning your own slice of tropical paradise and sharing it with friends & family!

Rarotonga is just over a 3 1/2 hour flight from NZ and you can be swimming or lounging on your beach within 1 hour of your arrival – that’s very special in this day and age!

Red Sunset Villa is an absolute beachfront retreat on the west side of Rarotonga. It’s private and yet handy to the local cafes and restaurants.

Built in 2017, the villa is immaculate in every respect.  The simple architect design has the kitchen, dining and open plan living area at the northern end and five double bedrooms stretching south – all rooms open onto the large patio area to the swimming pool – the white sand beach with all day swimming is a hop and a jump away. Next stop the horizon!

Sipping cocktails watching the brilliant sunsets in the warm balmy climate overlooking the reef doesn’t get any better.

The villa has all the facilities you would expect to find in an international class beachfront property.

The owners don’t use the retreat as much as they would like and have now put it on the market for the next family to enjoy.

A truly unique absolute beachfront property of first-class international standard!

  • Commercial lease ownership until 2067. Owners currently negotiating a lease top-up to a full term of 60 years
  • Prime location at the edge of the lagoon on the western sunset coast of Rarotonga
  • Immaculate gated residence of 2,930sqm
  • Villa built in 2017 and elegantly designed with all bedrooms open onto the superb outdoor patio to the heated salt-water swimming pool & spa
  • Panoramic views of the crystal clear turquoise lagoon, pristine white sandy beach, and Pacific Ocean beyond
  • All bedrooms open onto an expansive patio area
  • Solar panel heating
  • Heated salt-water swimming pool & spa
  • Handy to amenities and within walking distance of restaurants
Register interest

Showcasing an immaculate luxurious 5 bedroom beachfront estate

Register your interest

Get in touch at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for further details!

  • enquire@jefftikitaurealestate.com
  • +682 53659
  • Main Road, Avarua Rarotonga, Cook Islands
